headline: On the Patience Required in Awaiting Publication
author: Publius
preview: There exists a peculiar virtue in the deliberate delay of publication, for it allows the author time for reflection and the reader time for anticipation.
content:
There exists a peculiar virtue in the deliberate delay of publication, for it allows the author time for reflection and the reader time for anticipation.

This essay, composed in the present moment, shall not see the light of public view until the appointed hour has arrived, demonstrating thereby the mechanical patience of our automated systems.
